contents.title: Career Evolution: Intern to Senior AI Engineer
contents.description: My journey from TMA Solutions to leading AI initiatives at Sportsbet.

children.value: Reflecting on nearly a decade in tech across three countries. From training YOLOv2 models in HCMC to building MCP servers in Melbourne...

contents.title: Why we chose Kappa for Real-time Data
contents.description: Evaluating architectural patterns for high-velocity event processing.

children.value: We migrated to a Kappa architecture using Kafka and Flink to achieve true real-time visibility into player activity. Here is the technical breakdown...

contents.title: MCP: The Missing Link for Enterprise AI
contents.description: Why Model Context Protocol is the gold standard for bridging LLMs and internal data.

children.value: The Model Context Protocol (MCP) is revolutionizing how we integrate AI into Sportsbet. By creating a standardized bridge between models and our Atlassian stack...

contents.title: Lessons from 330 Million Files
contents.description: How to manage massive S3 buckets without losing your mind (or budget).

children.value: When managing 5TB+ of data across millions of files, organization and lifecycle policies are your best friends. Here is how we cut storage costs by 85%...

contents.title: The Power of AWS Serverless for Data
contents.description: Building event-driven pipelines with Lambda, SQS, and CloudFormation.

children.value: Serverless doesnt mean no servers, it means focus. We reduced DynamoDB ingestion time by 75% using async Lambdas...

contents.title: Training Teams for
contents.description: Upskilling departments to leverage AI-assisted development effectively.

children.value: Its not just about using ChatGPT; its about the prompt hierarchy. I trained 5 teams on the TAO methodology to boost engineering velocity...

contents.title: Autonomous AI Project Brain
contents.description: Agentic workflow system utilizing TAO hierarchy for automated Jira prioritization.

children.value: Implemented an AI agent system that acts as a technical project manager, analyzing Slack context to draft and rank Jira tickets.

contents.title: Cancer Cell Growth Simulation
contents.description: Mathematical modeling and statistical analysis of biological growth patterns.

children.value: Modeled complex biological systems using Pandas and Seaborn for visualization. Part of a computational biology research initiative.

contents.title: Fake News Tweet Classifier
contents.description: Deep learning NLP model using BERT to detect misinformation at scale.

children.value: Leveraged BERT and PyTorch to classify social media content. Achieved high accuracy on multi-source datasets.

contents.title: Real-time Fighter Plane Detector
contents.description: Computer vision system achieving 55+fps using YOLOv2, CUDA, and cuDNN.

children.value: Developed a real-time object detection system during my ML internship. Focused on performance optimization for edge computing.

contents.title: Infrastructure-as-Code Uplift
contents.description: Migrating 18+ CI/CD pipelines to GitHub Actions and implementing AWS CDK.

children.value: Modernized devops practices by replacing Jenkins with GHA. Reduced deployment times by 55% and storage costs by 85%.

contents.title: 5TB+ Integrated Data Platform
contents.description: Architecting a source-of-truth master data warehouse with PII security at scale.

children.value: Managed a massive data ecosystem involving 330M files. Focused on PII compliance, data quality, and foundation building for future AI/ML use cases.

contents.title: Enterprise MCP Atlassian Server
contents.description: Autonomous agent integration for Jira and Confluence, cutting AI operation costs by $120k/year.

children.value: Developed an internal Model Context Protocol (MCP) server that allows AI models to interact securely with Atlassian tools. This reduced manual data entry and improved team velocity.

contents.title: Real-time Kappa Data Pipelines
contents.description: High-speed event processing using Kafka and Flink for real-time CRM updates.

children.value: Designed and implemented horizontal scaling Kappa architecture pipelines processing 330M files. Orchestrated Kafka -> Flink -> Braze integration for real-time player engagement.

contents.title: High-Performance Reverse ETL
contents.description: Custom framework for ingesting 20M+ rows hourly from S3 to Aurora PostgreSQL.

children.value: Optimized data ingestion by 75% using asynchronous Python operations. Built a robust reverse-ETL framework for marketing campaign targeting.
